description: A high-performance career assistant that uses Gemini-3-Flash to map candidate profiles to job descriptions, generating ATS-optimized resumes and LinkedIn content.
key_features: Bulk Job Description Scanning (up to 10 at once)
Text/PDF Resume Parsing for Profile Setup
demo_usage_instructions: To run this demo, ensure your hosting environment injects a valid Google Gemini API Key. The application stores user data locally in the browser to maintain privacy. Users can upload their own resumes or use the pre-loaded 'Greg Dukes' profile for immediate testing.
